name: Potato Kaiju Never Die!
description:
controls:

arrows to move and jump

space to shoot and collect loot crates

mouse to select in menus

Potato Kaiju is attacking Potato City!

its your job to try and kill it but the problem is, its an undying Kaiju...

well, at least you can see how long can you last for the high score.

run, jump and shoot to survive,

pick up loot crates for different weapons

and save the small potatoes to gain lives.

how long can you survive???
